comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of August 5, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C05E7DC1430E733A... lists a Miss Beulah E Kennard as Educational Director of a new association for department store workers. She had previously been a member of New York City's Board of Education and President of the Pennsylvania Association of Women Workers.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a biography of her for Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beulah_Elfreth_Kennard

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Another article on her work with shopworkers (with photo) is at: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-05-23/ed-... New-York tribune. (New York [N.Y.]) 1866-1924, May 23, 1915, Image 31
